epi_escort.name: Compulsive Escort
epi_escort.description:
[Night action as Compulsive Escort] roleblock a player. You may not roleblock a player twice in the game. If you do not select a target, one will be chosen at random.

If everyone has alive has already been roleblocked, you become a Compulsive Visitor.

[Night action as Compulsive Visitor] visit a player. If you do not choose a target, one will be chosen at random.

Win condition: eliminate the Plaguebearer.

epi_plaguebearer.name: Plaguebearer
epi_plaguebearer.description:
[Night action as Plaguebearer] infect a player every night. You are infected by default. The infection spreads as players visit each other.


Should everyone alive in the game be infected, you become Pestilence.


[Night action as Pestilence] Ransack a player every night. You will kill your target and anyone who visits them. You may also self-target to attack anyone who visits you.

[Passive as Pestilence] roleblock immunity

Win condition: reach parity with the Town or get them to mislynch twice.
